excerpt: "(GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rose, a Baltimore-based technology startup that provides a HIPAA-compliant mental health monitoring platform based on clinical trials and research by Johns Hopkins University, announced today it was selected to support healthcare professionals around COVID-19 and mental health at the Brigham and Women’s Hospital Emergency Department."
